recommendations: LinkedIn User ‚ÄúI worked with Alfred on a CMMS implementation at Sodexo. He is a very bright, organized and hardworking engineer. I have hired and managed many young engineers in my career, and I would put Alfred right at the top of new grads that I have worked with. Given the opportunity, it would be a pleasure to work with him again.‚Äù

Patrick A. Samaha ‚ÄúAlfred was a colleague of mine at Concordia University where we studied Industrial Engineering together. During our academic curriculum, Alfred and I worked on several projects together where he demonstrated a high level of professionalism. Alfred is self driven, motivated, quick on his feet with sensible reactions in all situations I've seen him in. I strongly believe that his perseverance, intellectual ability and enthusiasm for learning and working are qualities that should help him well in his future jobs. Patrick Samaha‚Äù
